headline.main: DONETS UNITS MOVE; 62-Mile Push Reported Threatening German Flank in South

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Wednesday, Nov. 26 -- Counter-attacking Russian troops in the Donets basin, supported by strong Cossack cavairy forces, have advanced more, than sixty-two miles against intense German resistance, the authorized Soviet military commentator declared in his broadcast from Moscow this morning.
abstract: USSR forces in 62-mi push, Donets basin, threaten German southern flank; Germans near Stalinogorsk; Tula attack deflected; Brit tanks slow Moscow advance; Germans issue estimate on losses; Germans claim more towns taken, Moscow drive; map
